summary: This mod aims to add a lot places for the player to call home.
descriptionHtml:
[u]DISCLAIMER:This mod is a WIP:All the content included in each version is complete as it is.This is not a half-finished mod.It's a compilation of player housing options.With each new version I will be adding more location for the player to call home.But as version 1 this file il completely playable as it is.

ALL DLCs ARE REQUIRED.

[/u]VERSION 1:This version includes 5 new player houses.The theme they follow is the same.A small farmhouse/cabin.
This 5 houses are located in each of the following holds:Whiterun(Frostwood Farm),Eastmarch(Northview Farm),Haafingar(Archwind Farm),Rift(Amberleaf Cabin) and The Reach(Juniper Hill Farm).
Each of this houses contains the following features:
-Full crafting (Smithing,Alchemy,Enchanting) furnitures
-An oven
-A custom butter churn that is actually a crafting station (turn 1 jug of milk into 1 butter)
-Cooking pot
-Hearthfire's planting soils on the outside (The number varies from house to house)
-Grain mill
-A mannequin
-2 a couple of weapon racks (in 4 of the houses i did not include weapon plaques since they didn't fit the humble mood of the house)
-2 Beds
-A bookshelf
-All the houses are at a short walk from the major cities 
-Full navmesh (inside and outside)
-Livestock on the outside (wich appears only after you purchase the house)
EXCEPTIONS:Amberleaf cabin includes a working fish hatchery and boat travel to Riften,Archwind farms has three apiary(ies?) on the back.

HOW TO GET THIS 5 HOUSES? Outside of this five house you'll find a note (stuck with a dagger near the front door) which will tell you were you need to go in order to purchase the house.Once in the right place(one of the 5 jarl palaces of the above mentioned cities),you will find a deed which you'll have to sign (activate) in order to purchase the house.(the script comes from Bert's tutorials and modders resources).
There is no quest related to the house purchase so you can look at the image section to see the location of each house.

NOTE:This mod was cleaned with tes5edit.

Version 2:will include houses in the remaining holds OR in Solstheim OR will focus on making the various guilds headquarters more useful as player houses.You decide.Vote in  the comment section.
author: PCDug
